item.description: Distance marker on SD-34 east. Distance to Jct SD-19, Colman, and Jct. I-29.

item.title: US-81 North/SD-34 East at US-81/SD-34 Split in Madison
item.description: US-81 North/SD-34 East at US-81/SD-34 Split in Madison

item.title: SD-34 East Approaching US-81
item.description: SD-34 East approaching US-81 in Miner County. Use US-81 south to Salem. US-81 North joins SD-34 East to Madison.

item.title: SD-34 East/SD-25 South at SD-34/SD-25 Split
item.description: SD-34 East/SD-25 South at SD-34/SD-25 split in Miner County.

item.title: SD-34 East/SD-25 North at SD-34/SD-25 Split
item.description: SD-34 East/SD-25 North at SD-34/SD-25 split in Miner County. Use SD-25 North to De Smet; SD-34 East to Howard.

item.description: SD-25 North/SD-34 East in Miner County

item.title: SD-34 East at SD-25 South
item.description: SD-34 East at SD-25 South to Epiphany. Continue on SD-34 East/SD-25 North to Howard. SD-25 North joins SD-34 eastbound.

item.title: SD-34 East/SD-37 South at SD-34/SD-37 Split
item.description: SD-34 East/SD-37 South at SD-34/SD-37 split in Sanborn County.

item.title: SD-34 East At SD-37
item.description: SD-34 East At SD-37 in Sanborn County. SD-37 South joins SD-34 eastbound.

item.title: SD-34 East Approaching SD-37
item.description: SD-34 East approaching SD-37 in Sanborn County. Use SD-37 North to Huron. Continue on SD-34 East/SD-37 south for Howard and Mitchell. SD-37 South joins SD-34 East.

item.title: SD-34 East - Sanborn County
item.description: Entering Sanborn County on SD-34 east.

item.title: SD-34 East Approaching US-281
item.description: SD-34 East approaching US-281 in Jerauld County

item.title: SD-34 East at SD-45
item.description: SD-34 East at SD-45 in Buffalo County.

item.title: SD-34 East Approaching SD-45
item.description: SD-34 East approaching SD-45. Use SD-45 south for Gann Valley; SD-45 north for Miller. Continue east on SD-34 for Wessington Springs.

item.title: SD-34 East at SD-50 South - Lees Corner
item.description: SD-34 East at SD-50 South - Lees Corner.

item.title: SD-34 East/SD-47 South Split - Fort Thompson
item.description: SD-34 East/SD-47 South split in Fort Thompson.

item.title: SD-34 East/SD-47 South Approaching SD-34/SD-47 Split
item.description: SD-34 East/SD-47 South approaching SD-34/SD-47 split in Fort Thompson. Continue south on SD-47 for Fort Thompson and Big Bend Dam. Turn left for SD-34 east to Chamberlain.

item.title: SD-34 East/SD-47 South - Hyde County
item.description: SD-34 East/SD-47 South in Hyde County

item.title: SD-34 East at SD-47 - Hyde County
item.description: SD-34 East at SD-47 in Hyde County. Use SD-47 north for Highmore; SD-34 East/SD-47 South for Fort Thompson. SD-47 South joins SD-34 East to Fort Thompson.

item.title: SD-34 East - Crow Creek Reservation
item.description: Entering Crow Creek/Hunkpati Oyate Reservation on SD-34 north. The Crow Creek Reservation is home to the Crow Creek Sioux Tribe.

item.title: SD-34 East/US-83 Truck North/US-14 Truck East - Pierre.
item.description: SD-34 East/US-83 Truck North/US-14 Truck East in Pierre. Turn left to continue on US-83 Truck North/US-14 Truck East. Continue straight for SD-34 east.

item.title: US-83 South/US-14 West at SD-34/US-14 Truck/US-83 Truck
item.description: US-83 South/US-14 West (Pierre St.) at SD-34/US-14 Truck/US-83 Truck (Sioux Ave.). Turn right on Sioux Ave for US-83 South/US-14 West/SD-34 West. Turn left on Sioux Ave. for SD-34 East/US-14 Truck/US-83 Truck.

item.title: US-14/SD-34 East/US-83 North at US-14/US-83 Truck Route
item.description: US-14/SD-34 East/US-83 North (Sioux Ave.) at US-14/US-83 Truck Route (Pierre St.). Turn left on Pierre St. for US-14 East/US-83 North. Continue east on Sioux St. for SD-34/US-14 Truck/US-83 Truck. The truck route bypasses a low railroad bridge just north of this intersection.

item.title: US-14/SD-34 East/US-83 North - Pierre
item.description: Entering Pierre on US-14/SD-34 East/US-83 North. Pierre is the capital of South Dakota and is the 9th largest city in the state. Pierre is pronounced PEER.

item.title: US-14/SD-34 East/US-83 North - Entering Hughes County/Central Time Zone
item.description: Entering Hughes County/Central Time Zone on US-14/SD-34 East/US-83 North. The county/time zone boundary is on the Missouri River bridge.

item.title: US-14/SD-34 East at US-83/SD-1806
item.description: US-14/SD-34 East at US-83/SD-1806 in Fort Pierre. Turn right for US-83 South/SD-1806 South. Turn left for US-83 North/US-14 East/SD-34 East. US-83 joins US-14/SD-34 East across the river into Pierre.

item.title: US-14/SD-34 East Approaching US-83
item.description: US-14/SD-34 East approaching US-83 in Fort Pierre. Turn left to continue east on US-14/SD-34 and for US-83 north. US-83 joins US-14/SD-34 across the Missouri River into Pierre.

item.title: US-14/SD-34 East - Fort Pierre
item.description: US-14/SD-34 East in Fort Pierre.

item.title: US-14/SD-34 East - Fort Pierre
item.description: Entering Fort Pierre on US-14/SD-34 East. Fort Pierre is the county seat of Stanley County, and is directly across the Missouri River from Pierre. Fort Pierre is also in Mountain Time, while across the river the city of Pierre is in Central Time.

item.title: US-14/SD-34 East at SD-1806
item.description: US-14/SD-34 East at SD-1806 in Fort Pierre.

item.title: US-14/SD-34 East Approaching at SD-1806
item.description: US-14/SD-34 East approaching at SD-1806 North to Oahe Dam. Continue east on US-14/SD-34 to Pierre.

item.title: US-14/SD-34 East Approaching SD-1806
item.description: US-14/SD-34 East approaching SD-1806. SD-1806 is named for the year Lewis and Clark made their return journey through North and South Dakota.

item.title: US-14 East/SD-63 North at SD-34
item.description: US-14 East/SD-63 North at SD-34 in Stanley County. Turn left for SD-34 West/SD-63 North; right for US-14/SD-34 East.

item.title: US-14 East/SD-63 North at SD-34
item.description: US-14 East/SD-63 North at SD-34 in Stanley County. SD-63 North joins SD-34 westbound; SD-34 east joins US-14 eastbound.

item.title: US-14 East/SD-63 North Approaching SD-34
item.description: US-14 East/SD-63 North approaching SD-34. Use US-14 East/SD-34 East to Pierre; SD-34 East/SD-64 north to Sturgis (via SD-34) and Eagle Butte (via SD-63).

item.title: US-14 East at SD-63
item.description: US-14 East at SD-63 in Midland. Use SD-63 south to I-90 junction. Continue on US-14/SD-63 for Pierre. SD-63 north joins US-14 eastbound.

item.title: US-14 East Approaching SD-63
item.description: US-14 East approaching SD-63 in Midland.

item.title: US-14 East at SD-73
item.description: US-14 East at SD-73 in Phillip. Use SD-73 south to Kadoka; SD-73 north to Faith. Continue east on US-14 for Pierre.

item.description: US-14 East approaching SD-73 in Phillip.

item.description: Distance marker on US-14. Distance to Quinn and Phillip.

item.description: US-16 East Truck/SD-79 North at I-90/US-14 (Exit 61). Use I-90/US-14 West/SD-79 North to Gillette (Wyoming). Use I-90/US-14 East to Sioux Falls. SD-79 North joins I-90/US-14 West to Sturgis. This is the eastern end of US-16 Truck.

item.description: US-16 East Approaching US-16 Truck in Rapid City. Use either US-16 or US-16 Truck for access to I-90.

item.description: End SD-87 North at US-16/US-385. Use US-16 West/US-385 South to Crazy Horse, Jewel Cave, and Wind Cave.

item.description: SD-87 North at SD-89 in Custer County. Use SD-89 South to Jct. US-16A and Custer. Use SD-87 North for US-16/US-385, Sylvan Lake Lodge, Hill City, and Crazy Horse Mountain.

item.title: US-385/SD-89 North/US-16 East at US-16A
item.description: US-385/SD-89 North/US-16 East at US-16A in Custer. Use US-395 North/US-16 East to Hill City and Rapid City. Use US-16A East/SD-89 North to Custer State Park.

item.description: US-385/SD-89 North at US-16 in Custer. US-385 north joins US-16 east through Hill City. SD-89 joins US-16 east through Custer.

item.description: SD-34 east in Belle Fourche.

item.title: US-85 South at SD-34
item.description: US-85 South at SD-34. Continue south on US-85 for I-90 (at Spearfish).

item.title: US-85 North at SD-34
item.description: US-85 north at SD-34. Use SD-34 west for Heulett, WY; SD-34 east for Whitewood; US-85 north for Belle Fourche.

item.title: US-85 North at SD-34
item.description: US-85 North at SD-34. Continue north on US-85 for US-212 Junction.

item.title: US-85 North Approaching SD-34
item.description: US-85 North approaching SD-34. Mile marker 54 is posted to the bottom of the marker.

item.title: US-85 North - Belle Fourche
item.description: Entering Belle Fourche on US-85 north. Population 4,565. Belle Fourche is the county seat of Butte County, South Dakota.

item.title: I-90/US-14 West Onramp
item.description: I-90/US-14 West onramp (Exit 10) at west end of Spearfish business loop. Turn left for I-90/US-14 west; straight for US-85 North. The Exit 10 interchange is under construction when this photo was taken.

item.title: US-85 North at I-90/US-14 West
item.description: US-85 North at I-90/US-14 West (Exit 10). Turn left for US-14 and I-90 west. Interchange is currently under construction, and most of the traffic signs are temporary.

item.title: I-90/US-14 East at US-85
item.description: I-90/US-14 East (Exit 10) at US-85. Turn left for US-85 North to Belle Fourche. Turn right for BL-90 to Spearfish.

item.title: BL-90 East at US-14A
item.description: BL-90 East at US-14A. Turn right for US-14 East to Spearfish Canyon and Cheyenne Crossing. Continue ahead for BL-90 east for Deadwood. Deadwood is not directly assessable via BL-90 or I-90, but is the preferred route from Spearfish.

item.title: End BL-90 West at I-90
item.description: End BL-90 west at I-90/US-14 West/US-85 South Jct. Turn right for I-90/US-14 East/US-85 South.

item.title: I-90 East - Exit 12
item.description: I-90 East at Exit 12 - Jackson Blvd/Black Hills State University.

item.description: I-90 East approaching Exit 12 - Jackson Blvd/Black Hills State University.

item.title: I-90 East - Exit 10
item.description: I-90 East at Exit 10 - BL-90/US-85 North/North Ave./Belle Fourche. US-85 joins I-90 east through Spearfish.

item.title: I-90 East Approaching Exit 10
item.description: I-90 East approaching Exit 10 - BL-90/US-85 North/Belle Fourche/North Ave. This is the western end of the Spearfish business loop. US-85 joins I-90 eastbound through Spearfish.

item.description: I-90 East at Exit 8 - Mc Guigan Road/Black Hills National Forest.

item.description: I-90 east approaching Exit 8 - Mc Guigan Road/Black Hills National Forest. The Black Hills are in the background of the picture.

item.description: Spearfish - Next 4 Exits on I-90/US-14 East.
